QuestData.Title: Enemy Within
QuestData.Description: I won't sugarcoat it, kid. It's a madhouse here.$b$bThe leadership has fallen, selling their own souls as well as the souls of the workers to some darker forces.$b$bI will not give in.$b$bOverseer Bates surrendered the guard in his hunger for power. Show him that he is a fool.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The leader of the guard, he surrendered his underlings to the dark forces that have overtaken the wharf.
QuestData.CompletionText: After the guard fell, it was easy to get to everybody else.
QuestData.RewardText: Bates gave everything he had for greater power. Shame it had to go that way.
